casebody.data:
Richard PETROCINE and Ammie Petrocine, Appellants,
v.
OCWEN LOAN SERVICING, LLC, and U.S. Bank National Association, not in its individual capacity but solely as Trustee of OWS Remic Trust 2015-1, Appellees. No. 4D16-2330 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District. [July 5, 2018]

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
